Currently server_main.cc uses the return value to determine if a server should be started. If not, it always exits with return -1;.

I would interpret the integer as:

int result = ParseArgs(argc, argv);
// result > 0: start the server
// result <= 0: exit with code result
//  ie. result = 0, will exit successfully
//      result = -1, will exit with a failure code
